workItems.1: Engineered Vyapar desktop application features using frontend web technologies (Reactjs, JavaScript, CSS) and SQLite Database
workItems.2: Worked closely with Product and Design team from concept through deployment
workItems.3: Developed features which are used by around 35% of the active desktop user base daily
workItems.4: Followed design patterns in JS and React for high performant, modular and reusable code

workItems.1: Designed and developed Federated Learning dashboard using Reactjs, Redux, Sass preprocessor. It's currently being used by developers to add, train, validate, and check the training history for their FL model
workItems.2: Developed Alive switch engine as an Android Archive in Java,which helped UI team to query for the combo apps.
workItems.3: Developed API for generating document(docx),presentation(pptx), and excel(xlsx) on top of Apache POI in Java, for the team to seamlessly integrate their code for document generation

workItems.1: Implemented Intelligent Search for Android Platform using Lucene in Java
workItems.2: Developed the search, and query structure for the settings POC app, with suggestions and highlighting

workItems.1: Developed Voice Picking cross-platform POC app for Distribution Centres, Used Ionic2 (Angular 2) and cordova plugins for designing app
workItems.2: For Speech Recognition Used PocketSphinx tool with CMUSphinx library, Trained model with manual vocabulary, Language model and Grammar.
